getPlusOneCount().Description: If a Google+ Page, the number of people who have +1'd this page.

isVerified().Description: Whether the person or Google+ Page has been verified.

hasEmails().Description: Indicates whether the "emails" field is explicitly set to a value.

getBirthday().Description: The person's date of birth, represented as YYYY-MM-DD.

getOrganizations().Description: A list of current or past organizations with which this person is associated.

hasBraggingRights().Description: Indicates whether the "braggingRights" field is explicitly set to a value.

getLanguage().Description: The user's preferred language for rendering.

getPlacesLived().Description: A list of places where this person has lived.

hasAgeRange().Description: Indicates whether the "ageRange" field is explicitly set to a value.

getRelationshipStatus().Description: The person's relationship status. Possible values include, but are not limited to, the following values: - "single" - Person is single. - "in_a_relationship" - Person is in a relationship. - "engaged" - Person is engaged. - "married" - Person is married. - "its_complicated" - The relationship is complicated. - "open_relationship" - Person is in an open relationship. - "widowed" - Person is widowed. - "in_domestic_partnership" - Person is in a domestic partnership. - "in_civil_union" - Person is in a civil union.

hasTagline().Description: Indicates whether the "tagline" field is explicitly set to a value.

hasDisplayName().Description: Indicates whether the "displayName" field is explicitly set to a value.

getName().Description: An object representation of the individual components of a person's name.

hasCover().Description: Indicates whether the "cover" field is explicitly set to a value.

getDisplayName().Description: The name of this person, which is suitable for display.

hasPlacesLived().Description: Indicates whether the "placesLived" field is explicitly set to a value.

hasImage().Description: Indicates whether the "image" field is explicitly set to a value.

hasBirthday().Description: Indicates whether the "birthday" field is explicitly set to a value.

hasUrl().Description: Indicates whether the "url" field is explicitly set to a value.

hasHasApp().Description: Indicates whether the "hasApp" field is explicitly set to a value.

getAgeRange().Description: The age range of the person.

hasGender().Description: Indicates whether the "gender" field is explicitly set to a value.

getUrls().Description: A list of URLs for this person.

isPlusUser().Description: Whether this user has signed up for Google+.

hasId().Description: Indicates whether the "id" field is explicitly set to a value.

hasAboutMe().Description: Indicates whether the "aboutMe" field is explicitly set to a value.

getAboutMe().Description: A short biography for this person.

getObjectType().Description: Type of person within Google+. Possible values include, but are not limited to, the following values: - "person" - represents an actual person. - "page" - represents a page.

hasNickname().Description: Indicates whether the "nickname" field is explicitly set to a value.

hasCircledByCount().Description: Indicates whether the "circledByCount" field is explicitly set to a value.

getTagline().Description: The brief description (tagline) of this person.

hasCurrentLocation().Description: Indicates whether the "currentLocation" field is explicitly set to a value.

hasLanguage().Description: Indicates whether the "language" field is explicitly set to a value.

hasObjectType().Description: Indicates whether the "objectType" field is explicitly set to a value.

getCircledByCount().Description: If a Google+ Page and for followers who are visible, the number of people who have added this page to a circle.

hasOrganizations().Description: Indicates whether the "organizations" field is explicitly set to a value.

getCurrentLocation().Description: The current location for this person.

hasRelationshipStatus().Description: Indicates whether the "relationshipStatus" field is explicitly set to a value.

hasVerified().Description: Indicates whether the "verified" field is explicitly set to a value.

getUrl().Description: The URL of this person's profile.

isHasApp().Description: If "true", indicates that the person has installed the app that is making the request and has chosen to expose this install state to the caller. A value of "false" indicates that the install state cannot be determined (it is either not installed or the person has chosen to keep this information private).

hasUrls().Description: Indicates whether the "urls" field is explicitly set to a value.

getBraggingRights().Description: The "bragging rights" line of this person.

getImage().Description: The representation of the person's profile photo.

getGender().Description: The person's gender. Possible values include, but are not limited to, the following values: - "male" - Male gender. - "female" - Female gender. - "other" - Other.

getEmails().Description: A list of email addresses for this person.

hasName().Description: Indicates whether the "name" field is explicitly set to a value.

hasIsPlusUser().Description: Indicates whether the "isPlusUser" field is explicitly set to a value.

hasPlusOneCount().Description: Indicates whether the "plusOneCount" field is explicitly set to a value.
